New Records: India achieved their 11th consecutive victory in T20I matches.
Shreyas Iyer scored 74 runs off 44 balls, a significant milestone.
Ravindra Jadeja contributed with 45 runs off 18 balls, a key player record.
Sanju Samson added 39 runs off 25 balls.
Key Match Events: India won the match by seven wickets with 17 deliveries to spare.
Shreyas Iyer and Ravindra Jadeja were the standout performers.
Loss of captain Rohit Sharma early in the innings was a turning point.
Significant partnership between Shreyas Iyer and Sanju Samson.
Post-Match Reflections: Players and analysts praised Shreyas Iyer's performance.
The victory was highlighted as a pivotal moment in the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a chilly evening.
A sizeable crowd attended the match.
